name: Bookmark Calendar
description:
For every Image, an Emotion. For every Emotion a Story... 
WID brings you a year full of Images and Emotions.

It's a unique Bookmark-Calendar with 12 rotating sheets, each one illustrating an emotion in the front and a month in the back. 

All photos are original, taken by one of group members and are very unique relating to the selected emotion.

Small and handy, very touching, and easy to use.

You will have the whole year in your hand when reading your book!
